sense.name: divide into paragraphs
sense.examples: But paragraphing can also be arbitrary, with boundaries often shifting. As with paragraphing, we treat punctuation mechanically. We are publishing them with only minor changes in punctuation and paragraphing So paragraphing may present some bilingual writers with greater difficulties. Segmentation in spoken discourse is comparable to paragraphing in written. In Arabic, punctuation and paragraphing are a relatively recent developments

sense.name: write paragraphs
sense.examples: This principle also works for paragraphing a delicate, complex matter. All her friends were paragraphed in last Monday's paper.
